oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Avoiding Disasters with Freestall Design
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cook, Nigel B.
Nordlund, Ken
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: freestall design
economic
stall dimensions
bedding
Cow Comfort Index
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mistakes in freestall design are commonplace, and a matter of inches can make the difference between a satisfactory stall design and a herd disaster. A systematic way of assessing a freestall from a cow's perspective is required to accurately identify the problem and provide a least-cost solution.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2002; 261
